{{Marvel Database:Organization Template | Image = Phelcorp Industries (Earth-616) from Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 630 001.png | Name = Phelcorp Industries | EditorialNames = | Aliases = | Leaders = | CurrentMembers = | FormerMembers = [[Brian King (Earth-616)|Brian King]], [[Curtis Connors (Earth-616)|Curtis Connors]], [[Character Index/M#Marrisa|Marrisa]] | Identity = Public | Affiliation = | Allies = | Enemies = | Origin = | Reality = Earth-616 | Status = Active | BaseOfOperations = | PlaceOfFormation = | PlaceOfDissolution = | Creators = Roger Stern; Lee Weeks | First = Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #629 | History = [[Curtis Connors (Earth-616)|Dr. Curt Connors]] used to work at Phelcorp Industries.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #629}}
When he transformed into Lizard again, he immediately killed his boss [[Brian King (Earth-616)|Brian King]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #630}}
[[New York City Police Department (Earth-616)|NYPD]] officer [[Carlie Cooper (Earth-616)|Carlie Cooper]] was then called on the crime scene, where she met [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man]].{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #631}}
After [[William Connors (Earth-616)|Billy Connors]]' death, Spider-Man returned later to Phelcorp Industries to pick up a stock of reptilian antidote.{{r|Amazing Spider-Man Vol 1 #632}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Companies]]
